text: Ju Wu (; born 3 September 1999) is a Chinese professional boxer who has held the IBO International lightweight title since 2019.https://boxrec.com/en/proboxer/770262 BoxRec ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- ! !Result !Record !Opponent !Type !Round, time !Date !Location !Notes |- |11 |Win |9-0-2 |style="text-align:left;"| Alain Chervet |MD |10 |26 Dec 2019 |style="text-align:left;"| | style="text-align:left;"| |- |10 |Win |8–0–2 |style="text-align:left;"| Rimar Metuda |UD |8 |20 Jul 2019 |style="text- align:left;"| | |- |9 |Win |7–0–2 |style="text-align:left;"| Adones Aguelo |UD |8 |14 Jun 2019 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |8 |Win |6–0–2 |style="text- align:left;"| Salimu Jengo |UD |8 |23 Dec 2018 |style="text-align:left;"| |style="text-align:left;"| |- |7 |Win |5–0–2 |style="text-align:left;"| Peng Chen |UD |4 |31 Aug 2018 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |6 |Win |4–0–2 |style="text-align:left;"| Wenjie Lyu |UD |4 |11 May 2018 |style="text- align:left;"| | |- |5 |Win |3–0–2 |style="text-align:left;"| Hao Wang |UD |4 |30 Mar 2018 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |4 |Win |2–0–2 |style="text- align:left;"| Zefeng Zhan |UD |4 |22 Nov 2017 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |3 |Draw |1–0–2 |style="text-align:left;"| Lingjie Zha |PTS |4 |17 Dec 2016 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |2 |Win |1–0–1 |style="text-align:left;"| Feng Zhang |UD |4 |14 Oct 2016 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |1 |Draw |0–0–1 |style="text-align:left;"| Xiaolu Mu |SD |4 |13 Aug 2016 |style="text- align:left;"| | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Chinese boxers Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Jinan Category:Lightweight boxers
